Path to license file in S3 Bucket: The Logical Resource Name - commonly set by parent stack
can contain only alphanumeric characters, spaces, dashes and underscores.

{u'Fn::Base64': {u'Fn::Join': [u'', [u'#!/bin/bash -v
', u'yum update -y aws-cfn-bootstrap
', u'#placeholder for enterprise license
', u'/bin/mkdir -p /etc/splunk
', u'#do some chef things before the cfn-init due to race issues
', u'/bin/mkdir -p /etc/chef
', u'/bin/mkdir -p /var/lib/chef
', u'/bin/mkdir -p /var/log/chef
', u'/usr/sbin/groupadd chef -r
', u'/usr/sbin/useradd chef -r -s /bin/sh -d /var/lib/chef -g chef
', u'# Helper function
', u'function error_exit
', u'{
', u'  /opt/aws/bin/cfn-signal -e 1 -r "$1" '', {u'Ref': u'WaitHandle'}, u"'
", u'  exit 1
', u'}
', u'function retry {
', u'   nTrys=0
', u'   maxTrys=5
', u'   status=256
', u'   until [ $status == 0 ] ; do
', u'      $1
', u'      status=$?
', u'      nTrys=$(($nTrys + 1))
', u'      if [ $nTrys -gt $maxTrys ] ; then
', u'            echo "Number of re-trys exceeded. Exit code: $status"
', u'            exit $status
', u'      fi
', u'      if [ $status != 0 ] ; then
', u'            echo "Failed (exit code $status)... retry $nTrys"
', u'            sleep 10
', u'      fi
', u'   done
', u'}
', u'retry "/opt/aws/bin/cfn-init -v -s ', {u'Ref': u'AWS::StackId'}, u' -r SplunkServerHost ', u'    --access-key ', {u'Ref': u'CfnKeys'}, u'    --secret-key ', {u'Fn::GetAtt': [u'CfnKeys', u'SecretAccessKey']}, u'    --region ', {u'Ref': u'AWS::Region'}, u'" || error_exit 'Failed to run cfn-init'
', u'#set HOME variable needed by splunk to cache Auth tokens
', u'export HOME="/root"
', u'#install chef client for later
', u'curl -L http://www.opscode.com/chef/install.sh | bash
', u'/usr/bin/wget http://', {u'Ref': u'ChefServerIP'}, u'/chef/chefme.sh -O /tmp/chefme.sh
', u"/bin/sh /tmp/chefme.sh || error_exit 'Failed to run chef-client'
", u'# All is well so signal success
', u'/opt/aws/bin/cfn-signal -e 0 -r "Splunk server setup complete" '', {u'Ref': u'WaitHandle'}, u"'
"]]}}
[{u'PolicyName': u'root', u'PolicyDocument': {u'Statement': [{u'Action': [u'cloudformation:DescribeStackResource', u's3:GetObject'], u'Resource': u'*', u'Effect': u'Allow'}]}}]

[{u'ToPort': u'22', u'IpProtocol': u'tcp', u'CidrIp': u'192.168.0.0/16', u'FromPort': u'22'}, {u'ToPort': u'80', u'IpProtocol': u'tcp', u'CidrIp': u'0.0.0.0/0', u'FromPort': u'80'}, {u'ToPort': u'8089', u'IpProtocol': u'tcp', u'CidrIp': u'192.168.0.0/16', u'FromPort': u'8089'}, {u'ToPort': u'9997', u'IpProtocol': u'tcp', u'CidrIp': u'192.168.0.0/16', u'FromPort': u'9997'}, {u'ToPort': u'9887', u'IpProtocol': u'tcp', u'CidrIp': u'192.168.0.0/16', u'FromPort': u'9887'}]

Enable SSH access via port 22, HTTP access via port 80, and Splunk ports 8089, 9997 & 9887 respectively for management, receiving, and replication
